org.springframework.mobile.device.util

Class ResolverUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.mobile.device.util.ResolverUtils

  • public class ResolverUtils
extends Object
    Static helper for determining how to handle the combination of device and site preference.
    Author:
    Roy Clarkson
